description: Gets details about a maintenance configuration for a given table bucket. For more information, see Amazon S3 table bucket maintenance in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:GetTableBucketMaintenanceConfiguration permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket associated with the maintenance configuration.

nested_items.name: tableBucketARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket associated with the maintenance configuration.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Details about the maintenance configuration for the table bucket.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the maintenance configuration.

nested_items.name: icebergUnreferencedFileRemoval
nested_items.description: The unreferenced file removal settings for the table bucket.

nested_items.name: unreferencedDays
nested_items.description: The number of days an object has to be unreferenced before it is marked as non-current.

nested_items.name: nonCurrentDays
nested_items.description: The number of days an object has to be non-current before it is deleted.
